title: Start
body:
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Man, one week to go.
<<move Lee StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Hey, Aigburth.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
What's up?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Read these lyrics.
<<name Friendship ...>>
He hands you a sheet of music.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Wait, isn't this one of our songs?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Yeah, we're going to debut with it.
But just...read through the lyrics one more time.
<<name Friendship ...>>
You read through them.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
"Oooh oooh ooh, wuv ya babe! Wuv ya, wuv ya! Ooooh oooh!"
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Aren't they kind of...I don't know, dumb?
I mean, do people even really talk like that?
->It's kind of dumb.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    It's a...little...weird.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Right?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I mean...can't we just say "love?"
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Or something else entirely.
->It's okay.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I don't know, I think they're okay.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    You think?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I mean, it's not...McCartney or anything, but it's fine.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    I guess so.
->This shit's fire.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Are you kidding? This shit's fire!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    R-really?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Yeah!
    "OoooOOoooOOOoooOOOOOOHHHHH WUV YA!"
    It's great!
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Yeah...great.
    <<flip Lee>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
Are you having doubts about the debut?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
No! I'm excited for it! I just...
...I don't know.
Do you think we should write our own songs?
->That'd be great!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Oh man! That'd be great!
    You think the company would let us?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Neutral>>
    I don't know. Maybe, definitley not before our debut though.
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    But I'm glad you agree with me!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah, for sure!
->I've never thought about it.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I've never really thought about it. 
    I don't even know how to write a song.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    I'm sure you could do it if your tried.
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    You've got a good ear for music, you shouldn't doubt yourself.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Hey, thanks!
->I don't think we can.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I don't think we can.
    I mean, the company comes up with all the songs.  They're all market tested and stuff, right?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    Yeah, they are.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Don't worry, the company knows best!  We're basically garunteed a kick-ass debut.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Neutral>>
    Yeah...I guess you're right.
